page.title: 12THE POLICEMAN
page.content: In our estate of Roseworth in the "BLOCK" we have a policeman on the beat His name is P.C.Harrison and he is our{community policeman.}We had a visit from the police to our school for a week and they showed us many things including truncheons and radios. The police keep{law and order and are also our{friends}in times of emergency or when we are in trouble. Policemen have dogs to help them find criminals because they have a better sense of smell.Each rank in the police has a different badge and every police officer has a different number on the shoulder of his uniform.{Policewomen are also employed doing the same job as policemen. Police also use horses when there are large crowds or a procession. I stroked a police-horse and gave him an apple when the police came to visit us.
